text: Ashadh Ka Ek Din is a 1971 Hindi film based on play of the same name by Mohan Rakesh. The film directed by Mani Kaul starred Arun Khopkar, Rekha Sabnis, Om Shivpuri and Aruna Irani. The film's story as in play is centered on a love triangle between Sanskrit poet Kalidas, Mallika and Priyangumanjari. It went on to win Filmfare Critics Award for Best Movie in India. ==Cast== *Arun Khopkar | Kalidasa *Rekha Sabnis | Mallika *Om Shivpuri | Vilom ==References== ==External links== Category:1971 films Category:Indian films Category:Films directed by Mani Kaul Category:1970s Hindi-language films
